name: Toolsa
title: Tools Manufacture Website
dis: It’s a tools manufacture website, where users can create account and order tools.
disMore: It’s a tools manufacturer website, where users can create accounts and order tools. User can manage their orders and they can give reviews. User can pay their order using Bank Card. Admin can manage products, users, and orders. Admin can add new products and delete products
tech: React, React Router, React Query, Bootstrap, MongoDB, Node js, Express js, Firebase, Stipe payment

name: David
title: Travel Guide Service Website
dis: It’s a travel guide service provider website, where users can hire travel guide.
disMore: It’s a travel guide service provider website, where users can create an account and hire a travel guide. User can book their guide for a specific dates and places. Users can choose different places and can learn about new places
tech: React, React Router, Bootstrap, React Bootstrap Firebase, Css

name: Inventory
title: Inventory Management Website
dis: It’s a stock management website, where admin can manage stock items.
disMore: It’s a stock management website, where admin can manage stock items. Admin can add items, remove items. Admin can manage and update item stock quantity
tech: React, React Router, Bootstrap, MongoDB, Node js, Express js, Firebase

name: Dronez House
title: Single Product Review Website
dis: Single Product Review Website, where user can see product reviews.
disMore: Single Product Review Website, where users can see product reviews. Users can know about the product and they see product users review.
tech: React, React Router, Bootstrap, React Bootstrap Firebase, Css
